AODCore.utility

Just general utility that is useful in AOD. Was much more useful in C++, now in D most of these are not necessary

const const(float) E;


const const(float) Log10E;


const const(float) Log2E;


const const(float) Pi;


const const(float) Tau;


const const(float) Max_float;


const const(float) Min_float;


const const(float) Epsilon;


float R_Rand(float bot, float top);
Returns:
A random float bot .. top

T R_Max(T)(T x, T y);
Returns:
Max value between the two parameters

T R_Min(T)(T x, T y);
Returns:
Min value between the two parameters

float To_Rad(float x);
Converts from degrees to radians

float To_Deg(float x);
Converts from radians to degrees

struct INI_Item;
Describes a variable assignment from an INI file

string key;
The left-hand side of the assignment

string value;
The left-hand side of the assignment

this(string key_, string value_);


alias INI_Data = INI_Item[][string];
Hashmap representing categories. Each category contains an array of INI_Item

Example:
  if ( data["audio"].key == "volume" )
    volume = to!int(data["audio"].value);


INI_Data Load_INI(string filename);
Loads an entire INI file

Params:
string filename file to load

Returns:
A hashmap representing categories, each of which is an array of INI_Item.
